title: 6 True Scary Childhood Trauma Stories
description:
These 6 true scary childhood trauma stories will haunt you long after the video ends. From unsettling encounters with strangers to eerie events no child should experience, each tale explores the lasting horror of traumatic memories from youth. If you enjoy disturbing true stories, real-life nightmares, and psychological horror, this video is for you.




On The Let's Read Podcast, you'll never stop discovering the creepiest True Scary Stories, Terrifying Internet Mysteries, Disturbing True Crime Cases, and Bizarre Paranormal Encounters — all read in full with immersive HUMAN narration and ambient horror. Whether you're into Real-Life Horror Stories from Reddit, True Crime Deep Dives about missing persons, or Creepypasta and Internet Lore that’ll keep you up at night, this channel covers it all.

We feature stories about Haunted Forests, Creepy Strangers, Unexplained Disappearances, Cults, Stalkers, and Cryptids like Skinwalkers and Wendigos. Popular themes include Scary Night Shift Sto
